name: STRESS AND WORRY
text: People under stress experience mental and physical symptoms, such as irritability, anger, and difficulty sleeping.

name: FAMILY DIFFICULTIES
text: Family life can be a place of refuge and security but for some it is a source of pain and disappointment.

name: GRIEF AND LOSS
text: It might be the loss of a loved one, relationship, pregnancy, pet, job or way of life. Other experiences of loss.
